name: Snowblind (Team Heartcannon)
description:
Warning!

The following game contains depictions of violence and gore that some players may find disturbing. Viewer discretion is advised.

Story

After what was supposed to be a routine excursion from the TUNDRA ECOSYSTEM RESEARCH STATION, field scientist Jay Carson finds himself in a cave with nothing but the half-frozen, mangled remains of his fellow researcher Palmer. 

His memory is cloudy and his senses are in disarray... who could have done this?

Shocked and horrified, Carson heads back towards the research station to seek help, but it soon becomes clear that all is not as it once was.

Controls Movement
  • Use the arrow keys to move.
  • Press the "X" key to interact with objects and pick up items.
Combat
  • Hold the "Z" key to aim.
  • Whilst aiming, use the "X" key to use your equipment in the direction you're aiming.
Menu
  • Press the "Escape" key to open your inventory.
  • Use the mouse to navigate through menus.
